resources.string: ->Our application make ways easy for booking doctors appointment. \n->All kind of doctors are available for you through this application. \n->This application is available for you 24/7.
An Admin can add doctor as well as can delete doctors profile.\nAdmin can manage users too.\nAdmin can add hospital as well.
This feature will be available in future very soon.\nWe are working on it...

Welcome to our Application!!! 

We are thankful to you for using our application. 

Our application provide a digital way to book doctors appointment and save your precious time. 

Firstly, If you are a new user then we advice you to fill up the details on profile page. 

You can search and book your appointment on book appointment page besides this home page. 

If you have any problem regarding this application,you can sent message or email to us. 
Note:Contacts are available on setting page.

Welcome to our Application!!! 

Our team appreciate the hard work and the other medical services done by all the doctors and frontline workers in the tough time of COVID-19. 

The entire world are thankful to all the doctors and co-workers. 

Firstly, If you are a new user then we advice you to fill up the details on profile page. 

If you have any problem regarding this application,you can sent message or email to us. 
Note:Contacts are available on setting page.
